name: AVAudioSessionDelegate
desc: A protocol that defines responses to changes in state for the audio session.DeprecatedThe use of this protocol is deprecated in iOS 6 and later. Instead, you should use the notifications declared in AVAudioSession.

items.name: func beginInterruption()
items.desc: Called after your audio session is interrupted.

items.name: func endInterruption()
items.desc: Called after your audio session interruption ends.

items.name: func endInterruption(withFlags: Int)
items.desc: Called after your audio session interruption ends, with flags indicating the state of the audio session.

items.name: func inputIsAvailableChanged(Bool)
items.desc: Called after the availability of audio input changes on a device.
